componentDescription: Renders a customizable gradient background with various styles and animation options.

type.description: Specifies the type of gradient to be rendered (e.g., linear, radial).

direction.description: Defines the direction for a linear gradient.

shape.description: Determines the shape for a radial gradient (e.g., circle, ellipse).

position.description: Sets the starting position for a radial gradient.

from.description: Specifies the starting color of the gradient.

to.description: Specifies the ending color of the gradient.

colors.description: An array of color stops to define a multi-color gradient.

animationDuration.description: Sets the duration for the gradient animation in milliseconds.

children.description: Content to be rendered inside the Gradient component.

views.description: Custom styles for various parts of the Gradient component.
